text: Bruce Cassidy announces Laurent Brossoit is starting tonight in Edmonton.  Keegan Kolesar will play for the first time since March 11 and Ben Hutton will fill in for Alec Martinez. https://t.co/6QOBuZu1G6
Goaltender Laurent Brossoit was activated off injured reserve and will start against Edmonton today for the first time since Feb. 25. https://t.co/okMe1UDUB0
